attributes.action: Social services should wear a body cam for there own safety and to stop lies
attributes.additional_details:
There’s been so many attacks on social services people this year alone plus the extra protection on young children life too

Involving a childs mental, physical and emotional wellbeing, that will affect the rest of a childs life should be fully backed up.
attributes.background: make it law that all social workers who deal with children and families involved ,care system to wear body cam for factual evidence the same as the police. People who can make powerful life changing decisions.a childs mental, physical and emotional wellbeing should be fully backed up by a bodycam

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577074
